name: Shift Tabs
description: Allows for moving tabs to the left or right

move-tab-one-left.description: Moves the current tab one to the left.

move-tab-one-right.description: Moves the current tab one to the right.

move-tab-far-left.description: Moves the current tab to the far left.

move-tab-far-right.description: Moves the current tab to the far right.
